name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Java Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in building high-performance, distributed systems. Proficient in **Java**, **JVM** technologies, and concurrency, with a strong foundation in performance engineering, garbage collection, and caching techniques. Demonstrated expertise in observability and indexing within high-availability environments.
Deeply experienced in full-stack development with proficiency in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, utilizing frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Additionally, skilled in developing AI/ML-powered applications to enhance predictive analytics and automation.
Expert in deploying cloud-native solutions on **AWS** and **Azure**, implementing microservices architectures, and managing CI/CD pipelines. Strong understanding of compliance protocols including HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2, complemented by a solid background in MLOps with tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
